parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Draws a rectangle on the map. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> map '''drawRectangle''' [c, a, b, angle, color, fill] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> map: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [c, a, b, angle, color, fill]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> c: [[Array]] or [[Object]] - center of rectangle in format: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - 1/2 width of rectangle (in meters)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - 1/2 height of rectangle (in meters) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p6</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - angle of rotation </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER6</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p7</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - line color in format: [r,g,b,a]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER7</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p8</name>=<value> fill: [[String]] - fill texture file or [[Procedural_Textures]]. Note that the file texture will not rotate with rectangle, use [[drawIcon]] for that. If fill texture is not empty, set line color to white [1,1,1,1] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER8</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

<br><br>[[Image:drawRectangle.jpg|250px]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[drawRectangle]] [
	[[getPos]] [[player]],
	20,
	20,
	[[getDir]] [[player]],
	[0,0,1,1],
	""
];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[drawRectangle]] [
	[[player]],
	10,
	20,
	[[getDir]] [[player]],
	[1,1,1,1],
	"#(rgb,8,8,3)color(1,0,0,1)"
];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[drawArrow]], [[drawEllipse]], [[drawIcon]], [[drawLine]], [[drawPolygon]], [[drawTriangle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 22, 2014
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]
<dd class="note">Map example: <code>([[findDisplay]] 12 [[displayCtrl]] 51) [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["Draw",{
	(_this [[select]] 0) [[drawRectangle]] [
		[[getPos]] [[player]],
		20,
		20,
		[[getDir]] [[player]],
		[0,0,1,1],
		""
	];
}];</code><BR>
Be careful when using this command. Unlike map markers, the draw commands can decrease your framerate.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
